product_name: Gear Aid Tent Sure Tent Floor Sealant - 8 oz.
long_description: Tent Sure is a concentrated, high-performance urethane designed to recoat worn areas on tent floors, rainflys, rainwear and other gear-this bottle waterproofs up to 85 sq. ft. Tent Sure dries to a clear, flexible and long-lasting film with a nearly invisible non-gloss finish. Water-based, non-toxic formula. For use on synthetic materials; not suitable on natural-fiber fabrics.
short_description: Tent Sure is a concentrated, high-performance urethane designed to recoat worn areas on tent floors, rainflys, rainwear and other gear-this bottle waterproofs up to 85 sq. ft.
